game_description: Imagine visualizing your geoscience models and data in virtual reality while interacting with your colleague’s 3D Avatars. BaselineZ accelerates experiences, knowledge sharing and decision making. Enhance your 2D screen workflows, with immersive and fun ways to work, share knowledge, and collaborate on 3D Subsurface Projects from anywhere. FREE (NO REGISTRATION REQUIRED) • Explore sample geoscience projects in Virtual Reality • Data visualization features FREE (REGISTRATION REQUIRED) • Explore sample geoscience projects in 3D • Access to the Web Portal • Connect with anyone from anywhere • Create your own 3D avatar • Create up to 5 data rooms • Upload a 3D Models to view in 3D • Display 3D objects, 2D images, videos and pdf files • Data visualization features ADDITIONAL OPTIONS BASELINEZ • Your own 3D Data Room JOIN FROM ANY DEVICE • BaselineZ is available in VR, MR, Mobile and Tablet
review_1: Independent user here: BaselineZ uniquely integrates digital outcrop models with core data and subsurface geological models. Seamless data transfer from industry-leading 3D modeling tools combined with public 3D data sources enables you to create an online geoscience & engineering collaboration experience that will be of immediate value to co-workers, operational partners, managers, and students. The Meta Quest 2 experience is amazing and the large number of additional collaboration clients (iPhone, iPad, Android, MS Hololens, PC) make this a very well-designed solution for the Energy finders serving our industry.
